project_name.justification: The text identifies the project of interest directly: 'Areas of focus in this staking program were the high priority AZ property...'

company_name.justification: The acquiring company is identified at the beginning of the article: 'Yukon Metals Corp. (CSE: YMC) (Frankfurt: E770) has doubled its land position...'

ceo_buyer.justification: The CEO of the buyer is quoted in the text: '...said Rory Quinn, President and Chief Executive Officer.'

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The article describes staking new, unclaimed ground, not an M&A transaction where a percentage interest is acquired from another party.

primary_commodity.justification: The text describes the project as a 'high-priority potential copper-gold porphyry asset', with copper being the first commodity mentioned.

verified_article_link.justification: The article is titled 'Yukon Metals Doubles Land Position' and explicitly discusses the staking program around the 'high priority AZ property'.

currency.justification: The company is listed on the Canadian Securities Exchange (CSE) as stated in the text 'Yukon Metals Corp. (CSE: YMC)' and confirmed in the detailed quote section 'Exchange: CSE'. The use of the '$' symbol in the quote section implies Canadian Dollars.

cash_payments_raw.justification: The article is about staking new claims and does not mention any cash payments as part of a transaction.

share_payments_raw.justification: The article is about staking new claims and does not mention any share payments as part of a transaction.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The article is about staking new claims and does not mention any combined cash and share payments as part of a transaction.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The article is about staking new claims and does not mention issuing shares as consideration for an acquisition.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: The article does not contain any information about share warrant payments.

option_payments_raw.justification: The article does not contain any information about option payments.

issued_share_price.justification: The article does not mention any shares being issued as part of a transaction, so there is no associated share price.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The article mentions a 'busy exploration season' but does not specify a drilling commitment in meters.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The article mentions a 'busy exploration season' but does not specify a monetary exploration commitment.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The article does not mention any Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) being acquired or retained as part of the staking activity.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The text specifies the area staked related to the AZ property: 'Ron Berdahl staked the area north of the southern AZ claims, which covered an additional 7,625 ha in 372 additional claims...'

coverage_area_unit.justification: The unit for the coverage area is provided in the text: '...which covered an additional 7,625 ha in 372 additional claims...'

resource_size.justification: The text provides assay results for rock float samples (e.g., '10% Cu, 126 g/t Ag and 7.08 g/t Au') but does not contain a quantified mineral resource estimate with a total mass or volume (e.g., tonnes, ounces).

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The text explicitly states the company name, ticker, and exchange: 'Yukon Metals Corp. (CSE: YMC)'.
